name: Garrison: Archangel
description: Garrison: Archangel is a fast-paced, customizable, mecha fighting game designed for one-on-one and multiplayer team battles. Design, build and pilot your Archangels today!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel i3 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750Ti / AMD Radeon R7 260X DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Tested with Very Low Settings at 1280x720 at 30 FPS.
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 950 / AMD Radeon R9 270X DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Tested with Medium to High Settings at 1920x1080 at 60 FPS.
